author: Barry K
title: How Your Fingers Predict Your Likelihood Of Buying Your Girlfriend Lingerie
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Stop what you’re doing right now and take a look at your right hand. If your ring finger is about the same length as your index finger, you’re more likely to give sexy gifts , according to a weird Canadian study that isn’t really that important, but hey, we just made you measure your fingers, so that’s fun. This relates back to something called the Manning hypothesis , which suggests that guys with longer ring fingers than index fingers were exposed to less testosterone in the womb, and so aren’t as masculine today as men with even fingers. The researchers in this study found that even-fingered dudes were more confident in their mating skills (because of all that testosterone), and thus were more likely to gift erotic panties to their partners.
